body: The efreeti style focuses on aggression and speed, taking inspiration from beings of living fire. Masters of the style can deflect and control fire, immolate their enemies, and summon forth gouts of elemental flame.Feats Path: Efreeti Style, Efreeti Stance, Efreeti Touch.
name: Efreeti Style
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Style Feats/Efreeti Style
